name: People Won't Die
description:
My second playable game ever.

You are the healer of this town, but people are sick. Find and discover all of the recipes to the cures by exploring the island and give everyone what they need to be well again.

When you touch an NPC they will tell you something. if they are healthy you'll see a smile or a recipe to some potion(recipes will show you how much you need from each ingredient to create the potion ). if the are sick you'll see the cure.

When brewing, press on an ingredient to add it into the caldron and press on the caldron to create the potion that is made from the ingredients in the caldron. press on the small caldron icon to clean up the caldron.

Controls:

Left + Right Arrows = Move

Space = Jump

E = Tp/Enter Home(Where you can brew potions) + Exit Home

Up Arrow = Give the NPC you interact with the cure that's in the sack
